roleset.name: To assume, suppose in advance.
roleset.note: Roleset based on usages in ULA-MASC1-rest. No VN class. Framed by Claire.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Well , to my understanding , intelligent design presupposes that everything in life is too complex , that it has to be designed .
example.arg: that everything in life is too complex, that it has to be designed.
